alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 11:06AM CDT until March 28 at 8:31AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...Arkansas... Saint Francis River near Saint Francis For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis, Lake City, Madison...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Francis River near Saint Francis. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Most lowland inside the levee system is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Saturday morning to 23.5 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
